home.title: Welcome!
home.subtitle: This app lets you check if cities are connected.
home.citiesList: The list of connected cities is in src.main.resources.city.txt. At application Startup, com/jay/app/config/ConnectedCitiesAppConfig.java loads the list of cities from the file
home.whatToTry: Try the following in a seperate browser window
home.try1: http://127.0.0.1:8080/api/connected/listConnectedCities to see a list of cities,
home.try2: or http://127.0.0.1:8080/api/connected/?origin=boston&destination=newark to check connectivity between an origin and destination,
home.try3: or login to the app with 'admin' 'admin' to see the api's swagger UI (click on Account->Sign-in in the top right corner in this browser window).
home.try4: this prototype application has some desirable features of a production grade application.
